participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, she has a passion for dance that reflects her vibrant spirit.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and family-oriented, he finds joy in simple pleasures and believes in the power of stories.
participant_2.background: i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.
